bg.tu_varna.sit.oop1.utilities

Class StudentUtility

  • java.lang.Object
    • bg.tu_varna.sit.oop1.utilities.StudentUtility

  • public class StudentUtility
extends java.lang.Object
    The StudentUtility class provides utility methods for handling student-related operations.

    • Method Detail

      • checkMandatorySubjectsGrades

        public void checkMandatorySubjectsGrades(java.util.Map<Subject,java.lang.Double> gradesBySubject,
                                         java.util.Collection<Subject> mandatorySubjects)
                                  throws java.lang.Exception
        Checks whether each mandatory subject has a grade assigned and that the grade is above 3.00.
        Parameters:
        gradesBySubject - A map containing subjects and their corresponding grades.
        mandatorySubjects - A collection of subjects that are mandatory.
        Throws:
        StudentException - If a mandatory subject has no grade or a grade less than or equal to 3.00.
        java.lang.Exception

      • isStudentAllowedYearChange

        public boolean isStudentAllowedYearChange(Student student,
                                          int failedLimit)
                                   throws java.lang.Exception
        Determines if a student is allowed to change the year. The student can not change year if passes the limit of failed exams.
        Parameters:
        student - The student to be assessed.
        failedLimit - The maximum number of failed mandatory exams allowed.
        Returns:
        true if the student is allowed to change the year and false if not.
        Throws:
        StudentException - If the student has more failed mandatory exams than the limit.
        java.lang.Exception

      • isStudentActive

        public boolean isStudentActive(Student student)
                        throws java.lang.Exception
        Checks if the student is currently active.
        Parameters:
        student - The student to be checked.
        Returns:
        true if the student is allowed to change the year and false if not.
        Throws:
        StudentException - If the student has dropped.
        java.lang.Exception

      • generateStudentOrThrow

        public Student generateStudentOrThrow(int facultyNumber,
                                      java.lang.String studentName,
                                      java.lang.String programName,
                                      int year,
                                      int group)
                               throws StudentException
        Generates a new student based on the provided parameters or throws an exception if the student can not be created.
        Parameters:
        facultyNumber - The faculty number of the student.
        studentName - The name of the student.
        programName - The name of the program the student is enrolling in.
        year - The year of study of the student.
        group - The group in which the student will be placed in.
        Returns:
        A new Student object.
        Throws:
        StudentException - If the student cannot be created due to validation failures.

      • getMandatorySubjects

        public java.util.Collection<Subject> getMandatorySubjects(java.util.Map<java.lang.Integer,java.util.Collection<Subject>> subjectsByCourse,
                                                          int year)
        Retrieves a collection of mandatory subjects for the specified year from the given subjects-by-course map.
        Parameters:
        subjectsByCourse - A map of subjects organized by course year.
        year - The year for which mandatory subjects has to be received.
        Returns:
        A collection of mandatory subjects for the specified year.

      • getAvailableSubjectOrThrow

        public Subject getAvailableSubjectOrThrow(java.lang.String studentProgramName,
                                          java.lang.String subjectName,
                                          int year)
        Retrieves an available subject for a given program and year. Throws an exception if the subject is not available.
        Parameters:
        studentProgramName - The name of the student's program.
        subjectName - The name of the subject.
        year - The year of study.
        Returns:
        The available Subject.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - If the subject is not available in the given program and year.

      • getEnrolledSubjectOrThrow

        public Subject getEnrolledSubjectOrThrow(java.util.Map<Subject,java.lang.Double> studentGradesBySubject,
                                         java.lang.String subjectName)
        Retrieves a subject that the student is enrolled in. Throws an exception if the student is not enrolled in the subject.
        Parameters:
        studentGradesBySubject - A map of subjects and grades for the student.
        subjectName - The name of the subject to be retrieved.
        Returns:
        The enrolled Subject.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - If the student is not enrolled in the specified subject.
